property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and you may battle it with this creature. {DOUBLE BREAKER} {LEFT GOD LINK} (As you put this creature into the battle zone, you may link this creature to a God that has "Center God Link" or "Right God Link". The linked god gets each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature would leave the battle zone, choose one side instead.) ■ While this creature is linked, this creature breaks an additional shield.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less. {DOUBLE BREAKER} {DORON GO} Gunman:When this creature is destroyed, you may put an exile creature that has "Gunman" in its name from your hand into the battle zone. ■ You can't put other exile creatures that have "Gunman" in their name into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less. {DORON GO} Gunman:When this creature is destroyed, you may put an exile creature that has "Gunman" in its name from your hand into the battle zone. ■ You can't put other exile creatures that have "Gunman" in their name into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, you may destroy this creature. If you do, your opponent discards a card at random from their hand.
